inclusion.criterion: Anemia by functional martial deficiency (as defined in the NCCN2016 recommendations)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hb < 11 g/DL, TSAT < 20% and ferritinlike between 30 and 800 ng/ml
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient with chronic renal failure with an estimation of renal filtration rate according to the formula CKD-EPI < 60 ml/min/1.73 m².
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient with vitamin B12 deficiency, folate deficiency, hemolysis and/or hemoglobinopathy.
exclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has CLL and large cell transformation. He has had a history of anemia, but the current assessment is unclear.
